text: @bbcquestiontime @BernardineEvari Fiona Bruce FYI “No 10’s scientific advisers warned that the government should tell people not to shake hands on the same day that Boris Johnson boasted about doing so “with everybody” at a hospital where there were confirmed coronavirus patients.”
